condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsParamWithoutClassifiersSelected
condition.expression: return object.id != null && (object.id === 'subject' || object.id === 'resText' || object.id === 'parentDocNumber' || object.id === 'docNumber' || object.id === 'dogNumber' || object.id === 'AgrNumber' || object.id === 'contractNumber' || object.id === 'question_cl_code' || object.id === 'SP_RegNumber' || object.id === 'regFullNumber' || object.id === 'house' || object.id === 'street' || object.id === 'city' || object.id === 'locality' || object.id === 'region' || object.id === 'linkedDocs' || object.id === 'CorrespondentAddress' || object.id === 'foreignDocNumber' || object.id === 'serviceDescription');

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsBoolParamSelected
condition.expression: return object.id != null && object.type != null && object.type === 'BOOLEAN';

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsDateIntervalParamSelected
condition.expression: return object.id != null && object.type != null && object.type === 'DATE_INTERVAL' && object.condition != null && object.condition === 'INTERVAL';

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsDateParamSelected
condition.expression: return object.id != null && object.type != null && object.type === 'DATE_INTERVAL' && object.condition != null && object.condition !== 'INTERVAL';

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsParamWithVCardFromSOSelected_EHRD
condition.expression: return object.id != null && (object.id === 'controlPeople' || object.id === 'preparedBy' || object.id === 'responsibles' || object.id === 'executor' || object.id === 'resExecutor' || object.id === 'resAuthor' || object.id === 'reqAddressees' || (object.id === 'addressees' && resource.searchParametersTable.filter(function(p) { return p.id != null && p.id === 'searchAreas' && p.value_textlist != null && p.value_textlist.filter(function(sa) { return sa === 'output_OutputDocs'; }).length > 0; }).length === 0));

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsParamWithVCardSelected_EHRDNP
condition.expression: return object.id != null && object.id === 'addressees' && resource.searchParametersTable.filter(function(p) { return p.id != null && p.id === 'searchAreas' && p.value_textlist != null && p.value_textlist.filter(function(sa) { return sa === 'output_OutputDocs'; }).length > 0; }).length > 0;

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsParamWithFetchedValues_OnlySelection
condition.expression: return object.id != null && (object.availableValues != null && object.availableValues.length > 0) && (object.id === 'reqType' || object.id === 'theme' || object.id === 'specMark' || object.id === 'appealWay' || object.id === 'referenceObject' || object.id === 'incomingSign' || object.id === 'reqTypeRequests' || object.id === 'mainTypeRequest' || object.id === 'correspondentType' || object.id === 'deliveryInfo' || object.id === 'receiveWay' || object.id === 'benefitGroups' || object.id === 'contractType' || object.id === 'contractStatus' || object.id === 'parentDocType');

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsParamWithFetchedValues
condition.expression: return object.id != null && (object.id === 'receptionPlace' || object.id === 'solution' || object.id === 'reviewResults' || object.id === 'currencyType');

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsLegalCorrTypeSelected
condition.expression: return object.id === 'correspondentRequests' && resource.searchParametersTable.filter(function(p) { return p.id != null && p.id === 'mainTypeRequest' && (p.value_text === '2' || p.value_textlist != null && p.value_textlist.filter(function(t) { return t === '2'; })); }).length > 0;

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsCitizenCorrTypeSelected
condition.expression: return object.id === 'correspondentRequests' && resource.searchParametersTable.filter(function(p) { return p.id != null && p.id === 'mainTypeRequest' && (p.value_text === '2' || p.value_textlist != null && p.value_textlist.filter(function(t) { return t === '2'; })); }).length === 0;

condition.name: WDSearchParameterForm_IsLegalAuthorSelected
condition.expression: return object.id === 'requestLegalAuthor' && resource.searchParametersTable.filter(function(p) { return p.id != null && p.id === 'mainTypeRequest' && (p.value_text === '2' || p.value_textlist != null && p.value_textlist.filter(function(t) { return t === '2'; })); }).length > 0;
